bibl.title: Royal Portraits in Sculpture and Coins. Pyrrhos and the Successors of Alexander the Great. (Hermeneutics of Art. 5.)
bibl.note: A study of both coins and sculptures, in historic context as well as style (320-250 B.C.). See pp. 109-121: Index s.v. Alexandria, Arsinoe II, Egypt, Ptolemy I-VI.
BROWN Blanche R., Royal Portraits in Sculpture and Coins. Pyrrhos and the Successors of Alexander the Great. (Hermeneutics of Art. 5.)
New York - Bern - Frankfurt am Main, P. Lang, 1995, 8Â°, xvii-121 pp. et 48 pll. ISBN 0-8204-2577-X.
